\SetAPI{J-C}
\section{cache.secondlevel.weak.active}
\label{configuration:CacheSecondlevelWeakActive}
\ClearAPI
Enables whether the second level cache should work with weak references to avoid memory problems. Valid values are "true" and "false".
%% GENERATED USAGE REFERENCE - DO NOT EDIT
\begin{longtable}{ l l } \hline \textbf{Used in bean} & \textbf{Module} \
	\endhead
	\hline
		\type{de.osthus.ambeth.cache.RootCache} &
		\prettyref{module:Cache} \\
	\hline
\end{longtable}
%% GENERATED USAGE REFERENCE END
\type{de.osthus.ambeth.cache.config.CacheConfigurationConstants.SecondLevelCacheWeakActive}
\begin{lstlisting}[style=Props,caption={Usage example for \textit{cache.secondlevel.weak.active}}]
cache.secondlevel.weak.active=true
\end{lstlisting}
